title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 8 Reaction: 49ers-Rams, Giants-Seahawks, Russell Wilson, DJ Moore penalty
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 8 Reaction: 49ers-Rams, Giants-Seahawks, Russell Wilson, DJ Moore penalty
description:
Richard Sherman reacts to Christian McCaffrey's incredible performance in the San Francisco 49ers win over the Los Angeles Rams, the Seattle Seahawks handing the New York Giants their second loss of this NFL season, and Russell Wilson doing high knees on the plane to London where his Denver Broncos got the win over Trevor Lawrence & the Jacksonville Jaguars. Richard gives his take on DJ Moore's touchdown and back-breaking penalty in the Panthers-Falcons game. #volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
